unnormalised: Arre yaar, LaTeX mhaka dukhi dita! Ek sadhem equation borooun dekhlem, ani atam mhajem document koslea alien spaceship-achem control panel bhaxen dista. Hanv shapath gheun sangtam, `x^2 + y^2 = r^2` kornnak itlo tras zaunk favo naslo. Dishta mhaka MS Word vaprun dis pois korcho podtolo. Kamit kamit taka 2+2=4 uprant ₹ symbol ghalunk computer science-ant PhD zai poddana. Zait mhaka mhojem mobile-cher calculator app vaprunk podttolo atam!
normalised: Arre yaar, L-A-T-E-X mhaka dukhi ditha! Eka sadhya equation baryache prayatna kale, ani mhaje document eka alien spaceship control panel sarkhem dista. Hanv shapath ghetha, x squared plus y squared equals r squared sarkhem itlen kasht divchen na. Hanv M-S Word vaprun udak ditalan ani te divala mhantalem. Kami aslem tari computer science-a-thilen P-H-D rupiya symbol taka divchen zai na don plus don chara zatalen. Falea mhajea phonache kalkyuletera app vapratalan!
text: Arre yaar, LaTeX mhaka dukhi dita! Ek sadhem equation boroitak sodlem, aani aata mazyem document ek alien spaceship control panel vori dista. Hanv soput gheun sangtam, `x^2 + y^2 = r^2` vori sadhi gosht korunk etlem kasht naka zaylem. Mhaka dista hanv MS Word vaprun dis sampoita. At least tanka computer science-anchem PhD naka podta ₹ symbol insert korunk 2+2=4 magir. Kaim zaina, hanv mazyem phone-arche calculator app vapurta aata!
